value:
$WmMPID_ニノ2,ch03_03_Nino_F_Normal2,Face|Jaffar... Where are we? Nothing looks
familiar, and the clouds... They're
spiraling in the sky...$k$p$WmMPID_ジャファル,ch03_12_Jaffar_M_Normal,Face|...We must go. Hurry.$k$p...!$k$p$WmMPID_ライナス,ch03_21_Linus_M_Normal,Face|Jaffar.$k$p$WmMPID_ニノ2,ch03_03_Nino_F_Normal2,Face|Linus?$k$p$WmMPID_ライナス,ch03_21_Linus_M_Normal,Face|Nino! Didn't think we'd run into you
here.$k$p$WmMPID_ニノ2,ch03_03_Nino_F_Normal2,Face|Linus... I, um...well...$k$p$WmMPID_ジャファル,ch03_12_Jaffar_M_Normal,Face|Get back, Nino.$k$pMad Dog... Get out of our sight.$k$pIf you don't... I'll take care of you.$k$p$WmMPID_ライナス,ch03_21_Linus_M_Normal,Face|Now, that's a laugh! You honestly
think that you... Well, all right.$k$p$WmMPID_ニノ2,ch03_03_Nino_F_Normal2,Face|S-stop it! Both of you!$k$p$WmMPID_ラガルト,ch03_20_Lagarto_M_Normal,Face|Nino's right. Black Fang assassins
should strike their targets and no one
else.$k$p$WmMPID_ニノ2,ch03_03_Nino_F_Normal2,Face|Uncle Legault!$k$p$WmMPID_ラガルト,ch03_20_Lagarto_M_Normal,Face|Nino... This again? Do I look like your
uncle? No, never mind...$k$pLinus, you need to stay focused.
We're looking for the one who injured
Lloyd. Priorities, young man.$k$p$WmMPID_ニノ2,ch03_03_Nino_F_Normal2,Face|Lloyd was hurt?$k$p$WmMPID_ラガルト,ch03_20_Lagarto_M_Normal,Face|We were ambushed. We didn't have
a chance to react...$k$pThey fought like one of ours—striking
from behind.$k$p$WmMPID_ライナス,ch03_21_Linus_M_Normal,Face|He was protecting my back. Damn it!$k$p$WmMPID_ラガルト,ch03_20_Lagarto_M_Normal,Face|He's alive, but we're in trouble. We
need to get out of here.$k$p$WmMPID_ジャファル,ch03_12_Jaffar_M_Normal,Face|The target?$k$p$WmMPID_ラガルト,ch03_20_Lagarto_M_Normal,Face|We never saw them. That, however,
offers a clue to their identity...$k$pHow many people, do you think,
could sneak up on Lloyd?$k$p$WmMPID_ライナス,ch03_21_Linus_M_Normal,Face|It would have to be one of ours—one
of the Four Fangs.$k$p$WmMPID_ジャファル,ch03_12_Jaffar_M_Normal,Face|The Blue Crow.$k$p$WmMPID_ライナス,ch03_21_Linus_M_Normal,Face|That damned woman... Did she really
think we'd let her get away with what
she did to Lloyd?$k$pIt's time I finish her off!$k$p$WmMPID_ラガルト,ch03_20_Lagarto_M_Normal,Face|There you have it. Angel of Death,
Nino... You're coming with us.$k$p$WmMPID_ニノ2,ch03_03_Nino_F_Normal2,Face|Of course!$k$p$WmMPID_ジャファル,ch03_12_Jaffar_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ラガルト,ch03_20_Lagarto_M_Normal,Face|Ever since we got here, it's just one
thing after the other. But I'm...enjoying
myself.$k$pIt's like old times. The Black Fang,
back on the job. Come on! There's
work that needs doing.$k$p

$WmMPID_ウルスラ,ch03_07_Ursula_F_Normal,Face|...Uww...gaa...$k$pI've failed...$k$p$WmMPID_ジャファル,ch03_12_Jaffar_M_Normal,Face|...This is the end.$k$p$WmMPID_ラガルト,ch03_20_Lagarto_M_Normal,Face|Wait! What's she—$k$pToo late. She chose death over living
with her failure. No surprise there.$k$p$WmMPID_ニノ2,ch03_03_Nino_F_Normal2,Face|Look! The clouds are dispersing...
It looks like the sky is returning to
normal.$k$p$WmMPID_ラガルト,ch03_20_Lagarto_M_Normal,Face|That's good news for all of us. Should
mean we're all in the clear... Lloyd,
too.$k$pThat leaves us with one question...
Linus?$k$p$WmMPID_ライナス,ch03_21_Linus_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ラガルト,ch03_20_Lagarto_M_Normal,Face|"Disloyal filth," I believe that's the turn
of phrase you used to refer to us,
traitors to the Fang.$k$pDo you plan to dispense your justice?$k$p$WmMPID_ライナス,ch03_21_Linus_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ニノ2,ch03_03_Nino_F_Normal2,Face|Linus, you're my brother! I...$k$p$WmMPID_ライナス,ch03_21_Linus_M_Normal,Face|Don't call me that, Nino. You haven't
earned my forgiveness.$k$p$WmMPID_ニノ2,ch03_03_Nino_F_Normal2,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ライナス,ch03_21_Linus_M_Normal,Face|But I won't kill you. Lloyd is alive...in
this world. Thanks to that...I can let
you go.$k$p$WmMPID_ニノ2,ch03_03_Nino_F_Normal2,Face|Linus...$k$p$WmMPID_ラガルト,ch03_20_Lagarto_M_Normal,Face|Then we live to fight another day.$k$pHey, Linus...$k$p$WmMPID_ライナス,ch03_21_Linus_M_Normal,Face|Now what?$k$p$WmMPID_ラガルト,ch03_20_Lagarto_M_Normal,Face|It may not be today, but... You should
try to find it in yourself to forgive
her.$k$pThe three of you were family once.
You, Nino, and Lloyd... And here, you
can be a family again.$k$pOr is it too late?$k$p$WmMPID_ライナス,ch03_21_Linus_M_Normal,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_ラガルト,ch03_20_Lagarto_M_Normal,Face|Like I said, doesn't have to be today.
But think on it, and see what Lloyd
has to say.$k$p
